View.Name: PortraitVGA
View.CheckCode:
Field OpenNewRecord Click NEWRECORD End-Click End-Field
Field OpenNewRecord1 Click NEWRECORD End-Click End-Field
Field PopulateRepeatFields Click ASSIGN CheckBoxRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN CodesRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN CodesTargetRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN CommentLegalRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN LegalValuesRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN MultilineTextBoxRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN NumberFieldRepeat = TRUNC(SECONDS( SYSTEMDATE, SYSTEMTIME) MOD 60) ASSIGN PhoneNumberRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN TextBoxRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN TextUppercaseRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time")
ASSIGN TimeFieldRepeat = SYSTEMTIME ASSIGN DateFieldRepeat = SYSTEMDATE ASSIGN DateSlashTimeRepeat = SYSTEMTIME
ASSIGN YesSlashNoRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time")
ASSIGN YesSlashNoRepeat = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") End-Click End-Field
Field PopulateNoRepeatFields Click ASSIGN CheckBox = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN Codes = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN CodesTarget = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN CommentLegal = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN LegalValues = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN MultilineTextBox = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN NumberField = TRUNC(SECONDS( SYSTEMDATE, SYSTEMTIME) MOD 60) ASSIGN PhoneNumber = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN TextBox = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") ASSIGN TextUppercase = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time")
ASSIGN TimeField = SYSTEMTIME ASSIGN DateField = SYSTEMDATE ASSIGN DateSlashTime = SYSTEMTIME
ASSIGN YesSlashNo = FORMAT( SYSTEMTIME, "Long Time") End-Click End-Field
